spell.name: Bottle Soul

time.condition: which you take when a humanoid you can see within 60 feet of you dies

entries: This spell snatches the soul of a humanoid as it dies and traps it inside the bottle you use for the material component. A stolen soul remains inside the bottle until the spell ends or until you destroy the bottle, which ends the spell. While you have a soul inside the bottle, you can use it in any of the ways described below. You can use a trapped soul up to 3 times. Once you use a soul for the third time, it becomes inert, and the spell ends. While a soul is trapped, the dead humanoid it came from can't be revived.
Borrow Life: You can use a bonus action to drain vigor from the soul and regain {@dice 2d8} hit points.

Borrow Experience: You can use a bonus action to bolster yourself with the soul's life experience, making your next attack roll, ability check, or saving throw with advantage. If you don't use this benefit before the start of your next turn, it is lost.
A creature that can see the bottle (such as one using see invisibility or truesight) sees a translucent image of the deceased humanoid whose soul you caged.

components.m: A glass bottle with a cork worth atleast 5 cp

trait.name: Storm Aura
entries: The area within 30 feet of Flemse is filled with swirling water and crackling electricity. Creatures within this area at the start of their turn take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage and have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on saving throws against spells.

trait.name: Tough Shell
entries: Flemse has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition grappled} or {@condition restrained}, and he can treat any attack that deals bludgeoning, slashing, or piercing damage as if it had dealt 5 less damage.

action.name: Multiattack:
entries: Flemse makes two attacks with Claw Slash and one attack with Thunderous Strike.

action.name: Claw Slash:
entries: {@atk m} {@hit 14} to hit, dealing 14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) lightning damage.

action.name: Thunderous Strike:
entries: {@atk m} {@hit 14} to hit, dealing 25 ({@damage 4d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. The target must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or gain 1 point of {@condition exhaustion} until its next turn

action.name: Riptide Burst:
entries: Flemse releases a surge of seawater in a 30-foot radius. Each creature within range must make a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}, taking half damage on a successful save.

legendary.name: Water Shield (Costs 1 Action):
entries: Flemse creates a protective barrier of swirling water around himself, granting him {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on the saving throws he makes before the start of his next turn.

legendary.name: Magnetic Pull (Costs 2 Actions):
entries: Flemse targets one creature within 60 feet. The creature must make a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, it is pulled 30 feet towards Flemse and is {@condition restrained} until the end of its next turn.

legendary.name: Tempest Wrath (Costs 3 Actions):
entries: Flemse unleashes a colossal wave of charged water. Each creature in a 60-foot line must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 50 ({@damage 9d10}) lightning damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful save. Creatures that fail also have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on attack rolls until the end of their next turn due to the stunning shock

trait.name: Antimagic Shield
entries: The Aldani Protector has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Saving throws againts Spells

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golem makes two attacks.

action.name: Slice
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Whirwind Slice
entries: The Aldani Protector Spins in place, slicing nearby creatures with its blades. Each creature in a 5-foot radius around it must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) lightning damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful save.

reaction.name: Spell Attraction
entries: In response to a spell attack targeting an ally within 120 feet of the Aldani Protector, It can instead causes that spell to target itself.

trait.name: Antimagic Shield
entries: The Aldani Attacker has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Saving throws againts Spells

action.name: Multiattack.
entries: The Aldani Attacker makes 8 attacks.

action.name: Water Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Spell Deflection
entries: In response to a spell attack missing the Aldani Attacker, it causes that spell to hit another creature within 120 feet of it that it can see.
